name: The Bisectional Twins
description:
A game for United Game Jam, the theme is 2.

In this game your will try to equally divide twin pieces of pink and green.

After shaking the box by 'Q' and 'E', the portion of less weight will be discarded, and new pieces will be added to pair up.

Once the number of items is under your control, solve them in one move.

All content by DiamondDruid.
